title: [Forsameekle as by ane act ...]
author: Scotland. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
notes: T.p. lacking; title suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Date of imprint suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
"Given under our signet at Holy-Rood-House, the twentie five day of Ianuar. and of our reigne the second yeare. 1627"--P. [2].
Reproduction of original in the Town House (Aberdeen, Scotland). Charter Room.
